short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy any TailwindCSS class with a simple tap! Tap, copy, and code – it’s that easy!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just one tap on any Tailwind class, and it’s instantly copied to your clipboard. It’s that simple!

Quickly copy classes directly from the docs
Perfect for TailwindCSS users who want a smoother workflow
No more interruptions. Tap, copy, and get back to creating. 

Give Tailwind Tap a try – it’ll make your Tailwind experience easier.
